description: Giant Hyssop (Agastache 'Garden Leader Blue') is a truly spectacular sight to behold. An upright, clump-forming perennial reaching 3-4 feet tall, it is covered with celestial blue flowers from summer through fall. Its foliage is a velvety, deep green with an anise aroma that is positively intoxicating. Butterflies flock to the blooms, making it an ideal choice for attracting pollinators. With its drought and deer tolerance, Giant Hyssop is easy to maintain and adds long-lasting color and texture to any garden. Its bold presence is sure to make it a garden leader.
